DOC.brief_title: Gulf War Illness Inflammation Reduction Trial
DOC.detailed_description: During Desert Shield Desert Storm ( Aug 2 , 1990 July 31,1991 ) 696,841 United States Military personnel deploy Kuwaiti Theater Operations . Today approximately one-third veteran suffer GWI , unexplained chronic multi-symptom illness . Evidence chronic inflammation veteran GWI emerge previous observational study . The goal trial determine reduce GWI-associated chronic inflammation effective treatment GWI . This randomize , two group , placebo control , double blind clinical trial . The treatment group receive low dose ( 2x5mg ) day delayed-release prednisone ( Rayos ) 8 week . The placebo group receive match placebo ( 2x5mg ) day 8 week . The primary outcome measure clinical trial change baseline HRQOL respect physical functioning symptom . The secondary outcome measure include change baseline peripheral blood level GWI-associated biomarkers inflammation , change baseline GWI-associated symptom ( chronic pain , fatigue , cognitive impairment ) , change baseline HRQOL respect mental functioning .
